@title Pausable
@dev Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.

nodes.documentation: @return True if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Pausable::whenNotPaused - The contract is paused, impossible to perform this action right now"

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is not paused.

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.

nodes.documentation: @dev Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

devdoc.details: Base contract which allows children to implement an emergency stop mechanism.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

pause().details: Called by a pauser to pause, triggers stopped state.

paused().return: True if the contract is paused, false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: Called by a pauser to unpause, returns to normal state.

devdoc.title: Pausable

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.
